name: TheStar
0:
”Alexa, open the star news”
”Alexa, launch the star news”
”Alexa, read the news from the star news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the star news
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can already get your daily dose of news from The Star from multiple sources – our website, from The Star app, posts on our official social media accounts and TheStarTV but did you also know that you can have the news read out to you?

So now when you are cleaning, cooking or just giving your eyes a break from reading, you can still keep abreast with the latest news.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
